Class BankAccountUtils

  • public class BankAccountUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides static methods for bank account check / creation

      static int getChecksum(java.lang.String numberWithoutChecksum)
      Calculates checksum for given account number (without checksum)
      static java.lang.String getInLongFormat(java.lang.String accountNumber, BankGroup bankGrp)
      Creates long/electronic format for given text-formatted account number If already in long/electronic form the same number is returned.

      Creates long/electronic format for given text-formatted account number.
      static java.lang.String getInTextFormat(java.lang.String accountNumber, boolean isValid)
      Converts long/electrical bank account number to text format Note: Account number must be validated before conversion validation is not performed here, and if '-' char exists the same number is returned.

      Validates given account number
      static int validateChecksum(java.lang.String longAccountNumber)

      • getInTextFormat

        public static java.lang.String getInTextFormat(java.lang.String accountNumber,
                               boolean isValid)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Converts long/electrical bank account number to text format Note: Account number must be validated before conversion validation is not performed here, and if '-' char exists the same number is returned.
        Parameters:
        accountNumber -
        isValid - account validation result
        Returns:
        String Account number format: 123456-987654
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getInLongFormat

        public static java.lang.String getInLongFormat(java.lang.String accountNumber,
                               boolean isValid)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates long/electronic format for given text-formatted account number. Relies that the isValid parameter is correctly given (isValid if really is valid.)
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - in text-format
        isValid - boolean true if validated (and valid)
        Returns:
        Accountnumber in long format
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getInLongFormat

        public static java.lang.String getInLongFormat(java.lang.String accountNumber,
                               BankGroup bankGrp)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates long/electronic format for given text-formatted account number If already in long/electronic form the same number is returned. TODO: Exception handling (now just base-exception thrown)
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - in text-format
        bankGrp - BankGroup
        Returns:
        long/electronic account number
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        Returns:
